---
title: "pulumi-jinja-templates"
---

Easily render templates with Pulumi using Jinja2.

```python
from pulumi_jinja_templates import render_template
from pulumi_command import local

home_directory = local.Command(
    'get home directory',
    create="echo $HOME"
)

user_name = local.Command(
    'get user name',
    create="echo $USER"
)

template = render_template(
    "./template_in.yaml"
    home_dir=home_directory.stdout
    name=user_name.stdout
)

```
